about.title: About Skytech Aviation
about.description: We are a certified aviation parts supplier specializing in authentic OEM components for civil aircraft. As proud members of the Aviation Suppliers Association (ASA), we maintain the highest standards of quality and reliability.

cta.title: Ready to Partner with Us?
cta.description: Join our growing network of satisfied distributors and airlines worldwide.

sourcing.title: Parts Sourcing & Procurement
sourcing.description: Expert sourcing of hard-to-find parts from trusted suppliers worldwide
sourcing.details: Our extensive network enables us to locate and procure rare and obsolete parts quickly and efficiently.

technical.title: Technical Support
technical.description: Expert guidance on part selection, compatibility, and installation
technical.details: Our certified technicians provide comprehensive support to ensure you get the right parts for your aircraft.

aog.title: AOG Support
aog.description: 24/7 aircraft on ground emergency support to minimize downtime
aog.details: When every minute counts, our AOG team works around the clock to get your aircraft back in service.

logistics.title: Logistics & Delivery
logistics.description: Fast, secure worldwide shipping and customs handling
logistics.details: We handle all aspects of logistics to ensure your parts arrive safely and on time.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: Rigorous inspection and certification of all parts
quality.details: Every part undergoes thorough quality checks to ensure it meets aviation standards.

documentation.title: Documentation Support
documentation.details: We provide all necessary paperwork for regulatory compliance and traceability.

about.title: About Skytech Aviation
about.description: Learn about our commitment to excellence in aviation parts supply and distribution.

hero.title: About Skytech Aviation
hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Aviation Excellence

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide the aviation industry with authentic, certified aircraft parts while delivering exceptional service and building long-term partnerships based on trust and reliability.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the most trusted and preferred aviation parts supplier in the Middle East and Africa, recognized for our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction.

introduction.title: Who We Are
introduction.paragraph1: Skytech Aviation is a leading provider of authentic OEM aircraft parts and components, serving airlines, MROs, and distributors across the globe. Founded in 2010, we have built a reputation for excellence in quality, reliability, and customer service.
introduction.paragraph2: As proud members of the Aviation Suppliers Association (ASA) since 2015, we uphold the highest standards of quality, safety, and ethical business practices. Our commitment to authenticity ensures that every part we supply meets or exceeds aviation industry standards.
introduction.paragraph3: With our extensive global network and deep industry expertise, we provide comprehensive solutions for all your aviation parts needs, from routine maintenance to AOG emergencies.

asa.title: ASA Membership
asa.description: We are proud members of the Aviation Suppliers Association, the leading trade association for companies providing products and services to the global aviation and aerospace industries.

founded.title: Company Founded
founded.description: Skytech Aviation was established in Dubai, UAE with a vision to become the region's premier aircraft parts supplier

expansion.title: Regional Expansion
expansion.description: Expanded operations across Middle East and opened our first international office in Sharjah

asa.title: ASA Membership
asa.description: Became proud members of the Aviation Suppliers Association, demonstrating our commitment to industry standards

certification.title: ISO 9001 Certification
certification.description: Achieved ISO 9001:2015 Quality Management System certification, reinforcing our dedication to quality

global.title: Global Network
global.description: Expanded our distributor network to 50+ countries across Middle East, Africa, Europe, and Asia

innovation.title: Technology Innovation
innovation.description: Launched advanced digital inventory management and real-time parts tracking systems

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Honest, transparent business practices in all our dealings with customers and partners

quality.title: Quality Excellence
quality.description: Never compromise on the authenticity and quality of parts we supply

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Consistent delivery on our promises and commitments to customers

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously improving our processes, services, and technology

customer.title: Customer Focus
customer.description: Dedicated to exceeding customer expectations in every interaction

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: Uncompromising commitment to aviation safety standards

team.title: Leadership Team
team.subtitle: Meet the Experts Behind Skytech Aviation

ceo.name: Mohammed Al-Hashimi
ceo.bio: With over 25 years in aviation industry, Mohammed leads Skytech Aviation's strategic vision and global expansion.

cto.name: Sarah Williams
cto.bio: Sarah oversees our technology infrastructure and digital transformation initiatives, ensuring cutting-edge solutions.

sales.name: John Peterson
sales.bio: John leads our global sales team and manages key partnerships with airlines and distributors worldwide.
